wikipedia_page.main: Charles Bellany Thomson (12 June 1878 – 6 February 1936) was a Scottish footballer, who played for Heart of Midlothian, Sunderland and the Scotland national team.

response: * Charles Thomson (footballer, born 1878) (1878–1936), full name Charles Bellany Thomson, Scottish footballer who played for Heart of Midlothian and Sunderland
